mapper.select: SELECT c.cus_id, c.name, c.mobile, c.pic_url, c.status, c.light, s.store_name FROM cus_customer c LEFT JOIN st_store s ON c.store_id = s.store_id ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT c.*, ci.`name` as city_name , s.store_name ,e.`name` as emp_name FROM cus_customer c LEFT JOIN st_store s ON c.store_id = s.store_id LEFT JOIN city ci ON c.city_id = ci.city_id LEFT JOIN emp_employee e ON c.sales_consult_id = e.emp_id WHERE c.cus_id=#{cusId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT c.cus_id, c.name, c.mobile, c.pic_url, c.status, c.light, s.store_name FROM cus_customer c LEFT JOIN st_store s ON c.store_id = s.store_id WHERE c.city_id =#{cityId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT c.cus_id, c.name, c.mobile, c.pic_url, c.status, c.light, s.store_name FROM cus_customer c LEFT JOIN st_store s ON c.store_id = s.store_id WHERE c.store_id =#{storeId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT c.cus_id, c.name, c.mobile, c.pic_url, c.status, c.light, s.store_name FROM cus_customer c LEFT JOIN st_store s ON c.store_id = s.store_id WHERE c.sales_consult_id =#{guideId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT c.cus_id, c.name, c.mobile, c.pic_url, c.status, c.light, s.store_name FROM cus_customer c LEFT JOIN st_store s ON c.store_id = s.store_id WHERE c.mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryCusInfo},'%') ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT c.cus_id, c.name, c.mobile, c.pic_url, c.status, c.light, s.store_name FROM cus_customer c LEFT JOIN st_store s ON c.store_id = s.store_id WHERE c.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryCusInfo},'%') ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM cus_customer WHERE mobile = #{mobile})

SELECT c.cus_id, c.name, c.mobile, cp.id, cp.balance, s.store_name FROM cus_customer c LEFT JOIN cus_pre_deposit cp on cp.cus_id = c.cus_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON s.store_id = c.store_id WHERE c.cus_id = #{cusId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cus_pre_deposit (cus_id, balance, last_update_time, create_time) VALUES (#{cusId}, #{balance}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{createTime})
